When cheaters started flocking to Overwatch, they banned people in waves
What the cheaters didn't know was that they didn't just ban their account, they banned their hardware ID's
They also probably flagged IP addresses just to keep an extra eye out
yeah, eventually people discover hoe a game ticks and crack it wide open
All it takes is memory address modifications
